title: Carnival Anivia Passive MUST HAVE!
body:
Ok @kateykhaos @riot @skinsteam,

Festival/Carnival Anivia MUST turn into a Pinata when her egg pops. (since all you do is beat on anivias egg to break it) and if you succeed the death animation will be the pinata breaking... otherwise she transforms back?

Anyone?

replies.body:
Hey! 

This is a really cool idea (and something I'd personally love to see), but it isn't something that gameplay would give the green light for. Skins alone can be pretty bright and colorful in terms of effects, but we have to keep in mind that gameplay > skin aesthetics.

I don't really understand this reasoning?
Destroying the egg, and it popping like a pinata would not effect gameplay in anyway.
The popping effect might give a misleading appearance that the explosion effects might be damaging or harmful/debuffing otherwise.
Doesn't rumble explode than fall seconds later?

How exactly does this affect gameplay in any meaningful way? No mechanics are being altered - it's purely a cosmetic change.

What would be the concern here? How is clicking on a pi√±ata in any way different than clicking on an egg? The game mechanics operate exactly the same in both cases. I would directly compare this to Astronaut Teemo throwing Radar Dishes instead of his usual mushrooms.
